beats.label: ZONE 1: Mile 7
beats.narration: Mile 7. Bear Claw Poppy. Early singletrack with fun rollers that tricks you into thinking this will be manageable. The course is still being polite. enjoy it while it lasts.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

beats.label: ZONE 2: Mile 30
beats.narration: Mile 30. Rollers of Doom. The signature gravel feature that earned its name honestly. Technical rock gardens where your line choice determines whether you ride or walk the next five minutes.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: Lauf True Grit Gravel Epic course preview

beats.label: ZONE 3: Mile 45
beats.narration: Mile 45. The Chunky Miles. Course turns genuinely hostile with uphill rock faces requiring power surges your legs don't have left. Every pedal stroke is a negotiation with Utah sandstone.
beats.visual: Route map with zone marker animation

broll_sources.query: Lauf True Grit Gravel Epic course preview

beats.label: ZONE 4: Mile 65
beats.narration: Mile 65. Ridge Climb #4. The final ridge ascent where the accumulated technical damage meets legitimate climbing. Your bike handling mistakes from mile 30 compound into full-body rebellion.
